title: Prompting Segment Anything Model with Domain-Adaptive Prototype for Generalizable Medical Image Segmentation

abstract: Deep learning based methods often suffer from performance degradation caused by domain shift. In recent years, many sophisticated network structures have been designed to tackle this problem. However, the advent of large model trained on …

title: Joint Imbalance Adaptation for Radiology Report Generation
details: Y Wu, IC Huang, X Huang - 2024
abstract: Purpose: Radiology report generation, translating radiological images into precise and clinically relevant description, may face the data imbalance challenge–medical tokens appear less frequently than regular tokens; and normal entries are …
